questions.question: Which letter A-E is an example of a sample from members of all NTID student clubs?
answers: From all NTID student clubs, ask two members from each club if they own a computer.
Ask five students in the NTID Asian Student Club, if they own a smartphone.
Ask all NTID students who enter LBJ on Monday at 10am, if they use the RIT shuttle bus to arrive at LBJ.
A and B
A and C
questions.correct: Ask all NTID students who enter LBJ on Monday at 10am, if they use the RIT shuttle bus to arrive at LBJ.

questions.question: Which letter A-E is the population variable for the RIT administrators?
answers: The data collected of 150 student's parking time
All faculty, staff, and students who park at RIT.
The parking time for all students that park at RIT.
Students who park at RIT between 9am and 10am on Wednesdays.
A and B
questions.correct: Students who park at RIT between 9am and 10am on Wednesdays

questions.question: Do freshmen at Mars University get tuition assistance? We conduct a poll asking 40 freshmen if they get tuition assistance. Our population is:
answers: All students who attend Mars University.
All students attending Mars University who get tuition assistance
The 40 freshman who get tuition assistance
40 freshman who participated in our poll
None of the above

questions.question: This year at Mars University, there are 1400 students. Among the students there are 380 humans, 420 aliens and 600 Martians. Which letter A-E is an example of random sample of Mars University students?
answers: All 1400 Mars University students
All of the students on my soccer team
My friends at Mars University
100 human students, 100 alien students, and 100 Martian students, selected at random
100 faculty and staff at Mars University, selected at random
questions.correct: 100 faculty and staff at Mars University, selected at random

answers: Whether each customer sitting in a restaurant is a Smoker or a Non-smoker
Temperature of a cup of coffee served in a restaurant
The primary language of a student at RIT
A and B
A and C

answers: Student ID Number only
Student ID Number, Area of Interest, and GPA
GPA only
Student ID Number and GPA

questions.question: Mars University wants to collect data about students taking Introduction to Biology. Which letter A-E is an example of a categorical variable?
answers: Payment method used by students to buy the textbook for Introduction to Biology (cash or credit)
Weight of the textbook for Introduction to Biology
Year-level of students taking Introduction to Biology (freshman, sophomore, ... )
A and C
B and C

questions.question: President Destler wants to know if professors on campus would join a union. He cannot interview all professors, so he will obtain a sample. Which letter A-E is a method of sampling to avoid bias?
answers: Randomly select and interview fifty males and fifty female professors from the University
Interview professors who eat lunch at the faculty club
Interview all of the professors in five randomly selected departments
Randomly select professors who have filed complaints and interview those selected
A and C

questions.question: Do students at RIT support building a new library? The student government will ask a sample of students to take a survey. Which method of sampling A-E is best to avoid bias?
answers: Ask a random sample of workers at the current library
Ask 10 randomly selected students from each RIT college
Ask every 8th person who walks into the library that day
Ask the first 300 people who are listed in the campus phone directory
Ask the university president's family
questions.correct: Ask 10 randomly selected students from each RIT college

questions.question: The student newspaper editors want to know how students feel about the candidates who are running for student government. Which method of sampling A-E is best to avoid bias?
answers: Ask twenty randomly selected students at the gym
Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond
Ask all the students who live in your dorm
The next issue of the student newspaper will include a survey and ask students to mail in their responses
Ask 3 randomly selected students from each RIT major
questions.correct: Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond

questions.question: The student newspaper editors want to know how students feel about the candidates who are running for student government. Which method of sampling A-E is best to avoid bias?
answers: Ask twenty randomly selected students at the gym
Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond
Ask all the students who live in your dorm
The next issue of the student newspaper will include a survey and ask students to mail in their responses
Ask 3 randomly selected students from each RIT major
questions.correct: Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond

questions.question: The student newspaper editors want to know how students feel about the candidates who are running for student government. Which method of sampling A-E is best to avoid bias?
answers: Ask twenty randomly selected students at the gym
Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond
Ask all the students who live in your dorm
The next issue of the student newspaper will include a survey and ask students to mail in their responses
Ask 3 randomly selected students from each RIT major
questions.correct: Email a survey to every student on campus, asking them to respond

questions.question: Mars University is conducting a poll. Students will be asked, 'Do you support expanding the gym?' Which letter A-E would be the best way to collect our sample and minimize bias?
answers: Post flyers in the gym asking students to email their answer to the question
Send an email to 100 randomly selected students asking the question
Ask the question of all of the students in your kick-boxing class
A and C
None of the Above
questions.correct: Send an email to 100 randomly selected students asking the question

questions.question: Which letter A-E is true?
answers: The mean homeruns is higher for Sosa than for Bonds
The standard deviation of homeruns is larger for Sosa than for Bonds
Both A and B
Neither A nor B
Cannot compare Sosa and Bonds

questions.question: Which letter A-E is correct ?
answers: The typical batting average is higher for Sosa than for Bonds
Sosa is more likely than Bonds to have a batting average over 0.300
Both A and B
Neither A nor B
Cannot compare Sosa and Bonds

questions.question: Which letter A-E is correct ?
answers: Type A has a better chance of lasting over 3200 hours
Type B has a better chance of lasting over 3200 hours
Type A and B have the same average lifetime
A and B
B and C

questions.question: Which letter A-E is correct ?
answers: Test 1 has a smaller standard deviation; it's more consistent and less variable
Test 2 has a bigger standard deviation; it's less consistent and more variable
Test 2 has a wider spread than Test 1
A, B and C are all true
A, B and C are all false
questions.correct: Test 2 has a wider spread than Test 1
